name: Krawler
description: A game made for 7DFPS game jam. Made in GB Studio. My goal was to create a first-person game for the Game Boy. The main challenge was creating a tileset that just about fits into the tile limit restrictions. The dungeon layouts aren't perfect as it's really not GB Studio's forte to programatically create scenes/change tiles,  so I don't suggest trying to draw the maps out or anything like that, because they may not make sense!
